info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:21AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mineral and southwestern Missoula Counties through 245 AM MDT... At 220 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Alberton, or 25 miles west of Missoula, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lolo and Lolo Hot Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
